content: penny candy materials 100 g each of two colors of dk weight yarn if you like you can use a thicker or thinner yarn just use an appropriately sized hook and work the increase section until you ve used about half of your yarn work the decrease section until you have two stitches remaining then work row 13-14 sample worked in juniper moon farm cirrus color 01 porcelain and cirrus rainbow color 306 lemon-lime bubblegum 328 yds 300 m per 100 g size f 3 75mm crochet hook darning needle gauge exact gauge is not important for this project although it will affect the finished size of the shawl and the amount of yarn needed the sample was worked at 21 single_crochet/4 in 10 cm and has a wingspan of approximately 60 in 150 cm abbreviations this pattern uses us crochet terminology penny candy © 2025 mind s eye yarns chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch blo back loop only single_crochet single_crochet increase increase work 2 single_crochet in one stitch decrease invisible decrease insert hook through back loops of next two stitches three loops on hook yarn over and pull through two loops two loops on hook yarn over again and pull through remaining two loops instructions increase section with color a row 1 chain 2 counts as 1 chain and 1 single_crochet turn slip_stitch in back bump of 1st chain 2 stitches row 2 chain 1 counts as 1 single_crochet here and throughout pattern turn blo-increase 3 st change color always change colors on the last yarn over to finish the final single_crochet of the increase/decrease this will keep the edges of your stripes neat with color b row 3 chain 1 turn blo-slip_stitch across row 4 chain 1 turn blo-single_crochet until 2nd to last stitch in the last stitch blo-increase 4 st with color a row 5 as row 3 row 6 as row 4 5 st repeat row 3-6 43 more times 91 st or until you ve used approximately half of color a decrease section with color b row 9 chain 1 turn blo-slip_stitch across row 10 chain 1 turn blo-single_crochet until 3rd to last st in last 2 stitches blo-decrease 90 st with color a row 11 as row 9 row 12 as row 10 89 st repeat row 9-12 43 more times then row 9-10 once more two stitches remaining with color a row 13 chain 1 turn blo-slip_stitch across row 14 chain 1 turn blo-decrease 1 st cut the yarn and pull through weave in your ends and block penny candy © 2025 mind s eye yarns optional edging if you have approximately 5-1og of yarn left consider making a slip_stitch edge around the whole piece to neaten the edge penny candy © 2025 mind s eye yarns
